description.value:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.y8l4omYxEWH7vihP]{Meddling Futures}

Roll 1d4 to see what type of spirit is drawn to you. You gain the listed benefit for the action. If you attempt to use a different action, you must succeed at a @Check[flat|dc:6] or the action is lost.

1 Warrior You must attempt a Strike. You gain a +1 status bonus to your attack roll and a +2 status bonus to damage, or a +6 status bonus to damage if you are at least cursebound 3.

2 Adept You must attempt a Perception check or a skill action. You gain a +1 status bonus to the check, or a +2 status bonus if you are cursebound 3.

3 Sage You must attempt to Cast a Spell. You gain a status bonus to the spell's damage or healing equal to the spell's rank, or equal to the spell's rank + 3 if you are at least cursebound 3.

4 Wanderer You must attempt a Stride action, or a Fly, Climb, or Burrow action if you have the relevant speed. You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed for the action, or a +20-foot status bonus if you are at least cursebound 3.
You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.8PjTI21Mif26XWY7]{Energetic Meltdown}

Mild Backlash You take @Damage[(@actor.level)[untyped]]{damage equal to your level} as energy scours your body.

Moderate Backlash After taking the damage, you gain weakness to the energy type of your backlash until your next daily preparations. The weakness is equal to one-third of your level. You also lose immunity to the energy type if you had it, until your next daily preparations.

Severe Backlash You deal @Damage[(@actor.level)d6[untyped]]{1d6 damage per level} to all creatures in a @Template[emanation|distance:30] with a @Check[fortitude|against:class-spell|basic] save. You automatically take full damage without attempting a save.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.UJafwv306v75Syy7]{Forcible Energy}

The target gains weakness 5 to acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.UtUT6JngJbQRHySX]{Boaster's Challenge}

You gain a status bonus to damage rolls with your weapon or unarmed Strikes against the challenged foe.

You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed while your wings are unfurled.

If you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.UuVz1QY7QXD5cnLu]{Fledgling Flight}, you gain a +10-foot status bonus to your fly Speed with Juvenile Flight. As normal, since your fly Speed is derived from your land Speed, this status bonus isn't cumulative with a status bonus to your land Speed, if you have one.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.familiar-abilities.Item.6ZmgkMHUGGb1mDhr]{Familiar of Balanced Luck}

You gain either a +1 status bonus to its AC or a –1 status penalty to your AC.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.yOyMlFGAgLfRas8m]{Pistolero's Challenge}

Both you and the opponent gain a +2 status bonus to damage rolls with Strikes made against each other. If you're a master in the skill you used for the check, the status bonus to damage rolls increases to +3, and if you're legendary, it increases to +4.
You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your Constitution modifier until the end of your next turn.

Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you shield your more fragile wards from the threat of death. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase their current and maximum Hit Points by an additional amount equal to 3 times your Radiant Oath reputation tier.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's Hit Points by 10% or 10, whichever is higher.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.z7kwVNaCB4oJs3Fe]{Aura of Determination}

Your allies within 15 feet gain a +1 status bonus to Fortitude and Will saves against effects from aberrations.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.hOImeMiRPIRKPPXY]{Fluttering Distraction}

The enemy must roll its attack twice and take the lower result.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Tian Xia Character Guide

description.value:
This benefit is determined by alignment of the card you draw from the deck. The card can match both alignment components with yours (true match), match a single alignment component with yours (partial match), have no matching alignment components (unmatched), or have a diametrically opposed alignment to yours (misaligned).

True match: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to a saving throw of your choice (Fortitude, Reflex, or Will) for 1 minute.

Partial match: You gain resistance to one energy type (acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic) equal to your level for 1 minute.

Unmatched: You gain temporary Hit Points equal to twice your level. The temporary Hit Points remain for 1 minute.

Misaligned: You gain a +5-foot circumstance bonus to your Speeds for 1 minute.

publication.title: Pathfinder #192: Worst of All Possible Worlds

description.value:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.TLuFqQwvnlJNeEsv]{Crystal Luminescence}

The radius of the bright light and dim light of your crystal luminescence increase by 10 feet.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.YG2RxXE9SMfwo6wP]{Monastic Archer Stance}

You enter a specialized stance for a unique martial art centered around the use of a bow. While in this stance, the only Strikes you can make are those using longbows, shortbows, or bows with the monk trait.

You can use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.nbfNETdpee8CVM17]{Flurry of Blows} with these bows. You can use your other monk feats or monk abilities that normally require unarmed attacks with these bows when attacking within half the first range increment (normally 50 feet for a longbow and 30 feet for a shortbow), so long as the feat or ability doesn't require a single, specific Strike.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.WcY7H7mRiK2VDquV]{Extravagant Parry} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.n7nQQR940OvFbw7T]{Dueling Parry}

You gain a circumstance bonus to AC.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.4YqmeJQwnrG1Lg07]{Phenom's Verve}

You gain a +1 status bonus to your attack rolls with one-handed firearms and one-handed melee weapons.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.7G1gMSHyMdMGMsF9]{Protective Cycle}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Tian Xia Character Guide

description.value:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.XJCsa3UbQtsKcqve]{Thermal Nimbus}

You gain cold or fire resistance.

Your gizmos go into a state of incredible efficiency called critical overdrive, adding great power to your attacks. Your Strikes deal additional damage equal to your Intelligence modifier for 1 minute. After the Overdrive ends, your gizmos become unusable as they cool down or reset, and you can't use Overdrive for 1 minute.
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.2XmdYW8OsAvjGDG3]{Radiant Circuitry}.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.r5Uth6yvCoE4tr9z]{Destructive Vengeance}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.M8RCbthRhB4bxO9t]{Iron Command}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.enQieRrITuEQZxx2]{Selfish Shield}

Your strikes against the triggering creature deal extra spirit damage.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.VAcxOCFQLb3Bap7K]{Accept Echo}

You gain a +4 status bonus to all saves against possession effects.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.familiar-abilities.Item.O0XJIvMGK36yg9TJ]{Path of the Tempest}

Your familiar summons winds that speed up and protect you. You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed until the end of your turn. When you Stride this turn, you don't trigger reactions. In addition, you don't need to Stride before a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{Long Jump} this turn.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Tian Xia Character Guide

description.value:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.XJCsa3UbQtsKcqve]{Thermal Nimbus}

Choose cold or fire. You and allies in your kinetic aura gain resistance equal to your level to damage of that type.

For 3 rounds, your Strikes and spells deal additional damage against undead, creatures in possession of an imprisoned soul, or creatures you have witnessed create or command undead. You gain a status bonus to damage with your Strikes against these creatures equal to the number of weapon damage dice. Spells you cast from spell slots gain a status bonus to damage against these creatures equal to the rank of the spell; this bonus applies only to spells that deal damage and don't have a duration.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.IcAEMf94XoTvtzAO]{Fresh Produce}

You gain resistance to void damage.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.GF9uIGA947DiC2dR]{The Proud}

You take a –1 status penalty to attack rolls, damage rolls, and skill checks against creatures other than the exemplar, and a +1 status bonus to these rolls when targeting the exemplar.

Granted by Smite Good.

Until the start of your next turn, your Strikes against that foe using the weapon your blade ally inhabits deal an extra 4 spirit damage if the target is holy, increasing to 6 if you have master proficiency with this weapon.

If the chosen enemy attacks you before the start of your next turn, the duration extends to the end of that enemy's next turn. If the enemy continues to attack you each turn, the duration continues to extend.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.AkV4Jyllo6nlK2Sl]{Cobra Stance} if you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xQuNswWB3eg1UM28]{Cobra Envenom}, which increases the circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves and Fortitude DC to +2.

You enter a tight stance, coiled up like a lashing cobra with your hands poised as venomous fangs. While in this stance, the only Strikes you can make are cobra fang unarmed attacks. These deal 1d4 poison damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, deadly d10, finesse, nonlethal, poison, and unarmed traits.

While in Cobra Stance, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves and your Fortitude DC, and you gain poison resistance equal to half your level.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

For 1 hour, treat environmental cold effects as if they were one step less severe.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.7WBZ2kkhZ7JorWu2]{Bloodline: Undead}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to the spell's rank for 1 round.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.wYerMk6F1RZb0Fwt]{Battle Medicine}

You are temporarily immune to Battle Medicine from that person.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.dtPXuS8MiWrz5UNK]{Hot Foot}

The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} and takes a -2 circumstance penalty to Reflex saves.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xjLbabfyQzBNT4y1]{Twinned Defense (Fighter)} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.kTRGAST9J9ZxJZ4A]{Twinned Defense (Swashbuckler)}

Requirements You are wielding two melee weapons, one in each hand

You're always ready to use your off-hand weapon to interfere with attacks against you. While you are in this stance, you constantly gain the benefits of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Y8LHfkzGyOhPlUou]{Twin Parry} action.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.RXRnJcG4XSabZ35a]{Bloodline: Elemental}

You gain a +2 status bonus to Intimidation checks.
You gain Greater Darkvision for 1 minute.
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Q0A9V0zoY7MMXEqE]{Destined Victory} via Ephemeral Effect

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.QOOwC3S41CKGkxlN]{Vindicator}

You take a –1 status penalty to their saving throws against divine spells.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.fzERYW7BJQoxlvoD]{Corpse-Killer's Defiance}

You gain a +2 status bonus to attack and damage rolls against undead.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.DUb1VWSbTjdsbAkQ]{Deity's Protection}

You gain resistance to all damage.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.gwIgB6bMh0sruyX7]{Connect the Dots}

Your ally gains your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.xTK2zsWFyxSJvYbX]{Pursue a Lead} investigation bonus as a circumstance bonus to its Strikes or skill checks.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Wo0HNBh6CCgPN3Co]{Tiller's Drive}

Members of your crop receive a +5-foot circumstance bonus to Speed.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.CkK7WwaWnrLXK9sW]{Methodical Debilitations}

The target doesn't gain a circumstance bonus to AC from Raising a Shield, lesser cover, or standard cover; it gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC only from greater cover or Taking Cover.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.SheifYobjKqyK3Fv]{Tamper}

Your weapon has been tampered with! You take a -2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls and damage rolls with that weapon. The effect ends at the start of the inventor's next turn, or until you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} to remove it.

Granted when a ranger shares their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.JhLncIB10GSQowWL]{Masterful Hunter (Flurry)} with you.

Your multiple attack penalty for attacks against your hunted prey is -3 (-2 with an agile weapon) on your second attack of the turn instead of -5, and -6 (-4 with an agile weapon) on your third or subsequent attack of the turn, instead of -10.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Igt8Ml5YIdxueMlF]{Enjoy the Show}

You take a circumstance penalty to attack rolls against creatures other than you, or a +1 circumstance bonus to attack rolls targeting you.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.familiar-abilities.Item.onye3PN84lmca11D]{Familiar of Keen Senses}

Your familiar gains your choice of an imprecise scent, tremorsense, or wavesense, with a range of 60 feet.

You'll eat anything and anyone. Whenever you inflict @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} with your jaws unarmed attack, you gain temporary Hit Points equal to half your level for 1 minute.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.1gAehVvstGY885kJ]{Bristle}

You curl into a posture that splays out your bone spines. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

Special If you have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.oAWNluJaMlaGysXA]{Barbed Quills} reaction or a quills unarmed attack, each gains a +1 circumstance bonus to damage rolls until the start of your next turn.

The target creature gains a -2 circumstance penalty to Reflex saves
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Cu7P7NB3XH67mi1N]{Crash Against Me} via Ephemeral Effect

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.OtV7esAwza1U6Kwr]{Eye of the Arclords}

description.value: You gain resistance to acid, cold, electricity, fire, vitality, and void damage.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.w3qyriA1YnzXaas3]{Shield of Faith}

You gain a +1 status bonus to your AC.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.cErltcAC7OVnIyO1]{Predictable!}

You gain a circumstance bonus to AC and your next saving throw against the target. On a critical failure, you take a –1 circumstance penalty instead.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.QZb0Utg0WFPf2Qg0]{Goblin Song}

The creature takes a -1 status penalty to Perception checks and Will saves.

Granted @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.GrKurXVdm5lJkE2q]{Blade of the Heart}

Your transformed weapon gains one of the following weapon property runes on your weapon: corrosive, flaming, frost, shock, thundering, or vitalizing.

At 16th level, you draw the greater version of the rune instead.

description.value:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BQWGOK0lVmljCunm]{Rushing Goat Stance}

The only Strikes you can make are ramming horn attacks. These strikes deal 1d8 bludgeoning damage, are in the brawling group, and have the forceful, nonlethal, shove, and unarmed traits.

When you make a ramming horn attack and your previous action was to Climb, Stride, or Leap, you gain a circumstance bonus to damage equal to the number of weapon damage dice.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Tian Xia Character Guide

description.value:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.MRT8BGiIiVYfVcXh]{Eternal Torch}

You create a torch-like flame. If you create a flame on a weapon, you still need to use it as an improvised weapon to attack with the flame, just as with a torch.
This effect grants you the selected circumstance bonus or penalty to skill checks.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SMF1hTWPHtmlS8Cd]{Bullet Dancer Stance}

Requirements You're unarmored and wielding a simple firearm, bayonet, or reinforced stock

Effect You enter a specialized stance for a unique martial art centered around the use of simple firearms. While in this stance, the only Strikes you can make are those using bayonets, reinforced stocks, and simple firearms. You can use Flurry of Blows with these weapons. You can use your other monk feats or monk abilities that normally require unarmed attacks with bayonets and reinforced stocks, so long as the feat or ability doesn't require a single, specific Strike. You can also use them with simple firearms when attacking within half the first range increment.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.hPDerDCYmag3s0dP]{Paragon's Guard}.

Requirements You are wielding a shield

Once you've had a moment to set your stance, you always have your shield ready without a thought.

While you are in this stance, you constantly have your shield raised as if you'd used the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.xjGwis0uaC2305pm]{Raise a Shield} action, as long as you meet that action's requirements.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.O0uXZRWMNliDbkxU]{Bloodline: Hag}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to the spell's rank.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.IaxmCkdsPlA52spu]{Bones}

Curse of Living Death

Your body is slowly decaying even though you are alive, and using your powers furthers this unnatural living death. You carry a touch of the grave about you, manifesting as bloodless pallor, a faint smell of earth, or deathly cold skin.

Minor Curse

Bones protrude through your skin and your flesh rots, combining with a stench of decay and an unearthly chill. Non-magical effects that would restore your Hit Points only grant you half as many HP as normal.

Moderate Curse

Your dead flesh continues to rot, affecting your health. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}, and this drained condition is cumulative with any other drained conditions you gain. This drained condition is removed only when you Refocus; effects that normally remove the drained condition reduce your drained condition to drained 1 instead.

In addition, you gain resistance to poison equal to half your level. You gain a +4 status bonus to saves against diseases, poisons, and death effects, and if you roll a success on such a save, you get a critical success instead.

Major Curse (11th)

You stand just steps from the grave. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Wounded 1}. This wounded condition is removed only when you Refocus; effects that normally remove the wounded condition reduce your wounded condition to wounded 1 instead.

When you would attempt a recovery check, you can choose to get an automatic success instead of rolling, and if you roll a critical failure on a save against a disease, poison, or death effect, you get a failure instead.
Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BQ50m0Jb9qyoPchi]{Familiar's Resolve}

You gain a status bonus to saving throws against effects that would cause you to be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened}.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Tian Xia Character Guide

description.value:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.KMVXUgFArcftg1jQ]{Masquerade of Seasons Stance}

Choose one of the following traits: water, fire, void, or cold. You gain resistance to damage dealt by effects with the chosen trait.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.81jVmGF9Uo9dp2dI]{Heroic Defiance}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level and a +1 status bonus to all saving throws.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.W21jKAcG0GtEtBiK]{Giant's Stature}

You become Large, increasing your reach by 5 feet and gaining the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} condition until you stop raging

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.M2V1vqAziOkWV30B]{Crimson Shroud}

You gain fast healing equal to half your level. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Gu0QsFvWoR9EP5SE]{Swirl Crimson Shroud} action.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.6fojN9yBJByTZ1Q9]{Didactic Strike}.

Your first attack against the designated target before the investigator's next turn deals an extra 2d6 precision damage to the target if it hits.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.E8SDesgMD6Zbye2j]{Geomancer Dedication}

You gain resistance to physical damage (except adamantine) equal to the spell rank.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.4SKech3n0F38HrR5]{Vigorous Anthem}

You gain temporary HP equal to 3 + the source's Charisma modifier.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.PpzH9tJULk5ksX9w]{Bloodline: Psychopomp}

The border between life and death becomes blurred to you. You gain a +2 status bonus to Fortitude saving throws for 1 round.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xgg9eNF6MsJPMjyH]{Stone Body}

You gain resistance 10 to all damage.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.VN6Cws7BBta81AQ9]{Twisting Petal Stance}

You can make gale blossom strikes that deal 1d6 slashing damage. These strikes are in the brawling group and have the agile, finesse, nonlethal, shove, and unarmed traits. While in Twisting Petal Stance, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} and a +2 circumstance bonus to your Fortitude DC to avoid being Shoved. You also gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Deception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feint} and a +2 circumstance bonus to your Perception DC to resist an opponent's Feint attempt.

You lose Hit Points equal to twice the spell's rank.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.DYFOlJlMoDuHjrZx]{Channel the Godmind}

You gain precise motion sense out to 60 feet.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.hLYoIjH8gPEVXyWG]{Distracting Feint}

While a creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} by your Feint, it also takes a -2 circumstance penalty to Perception checks and Reflex saves.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BL2nLeClO30QoQGs]{Spark Fist}

Your fist loses the nonlethal trait and deals additional fire damage on a successful Strike.
You gain a +1 status bonus to Fortitude saving throws.

You gain a +5-foot status bonus to your Speed, and a +1 status bonus to attack and damage rolls.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Gcliatty0MGYbTVV]{Oracular Warning}

Each ally gains temporary Hit Points equal to half your level, which last for 1 minute.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.LJzk4Xxxs9IlbWz6]{Curse Maelstrom Dedication}

All creatures other than you within a 10-foot emanation take a -1 status penalty to all saving throws and skill checks. You gain the Expel Maelstrom action.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.cmhfYMEM4uzrNIiV]{Energize Wings}

You gain a fly Speed of 30 feet.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ajesR7y0jWzqjAgc]{Current Spell} if you cast a spell with the air trait.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC or a +2 circumstance bonus against ranged attacks. You also gain a +1 circumstance bonus to all saves against effects with the selected trait.

This effect has the selected trait.

rules.relabel: Effect: Current Spell against ranged attacks

description.value:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.7W5oubPLcxHJdcHX]{Drifting Pollen}

A haze of pollen floats around you. A creature in your kinetic aura when you enter the stance, or who later enters the aura or ends its turn in the aura, attempts at a @Check[fortitude|against:kineticist] save against your class DC. On a failure, it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2} on a critical failure) and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} until it's no longer sickened. A creature attempts this save no more than once per round and doesn't attempt a new save if already affected.

Your horns flash briefly as you grow in size and ferocity. Your size increases to Large, and you're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1}. This doesn't change your Speed, reach, or other statistics except as noted here. Your worn equipment automatically resizes to suit your new form, though it immediately returns to its original size if it leaves your possession.

This form is the same age and body type as your true form and has roughly analogous physical traits, such as hair color. Using Oni Form counts as creating a disguise for the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.AJstokjdG6iDjVjE]{Impersonate} use of Deception.

You can Sustain your Oni Form for up to 10 minutes, though you must then spend at least 10 minutes in your natural form before using Oni Form again.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Tian Xia Character Guide

description.value:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.u94fcPT5Oukqzql5]{Azarketi Purification}

You gain a +2 status bonus to your ongoing saves against poisons already present in your body.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7GeguyqyD1TjoC4r]{Unleash Psyche}

When you cast a damaging spell, you gain a status bonus to its damage equal to double the spell's rank. This applies only to spells that don't have a duration and that you cast using psychic spellcasting.

Associated with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ZR5Buon23cDQ1ryB]{Zombie Dedication}

You are slowed 1.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.tYOMBiH3HbViNWwn]{Bloodline: Genie}

Either you gain a +1 status bonus to Deception checks for 1 round, or a target takes a -1 status penalty to Perception for 1 round.

Granted by Fiendsbane Oath (Liberator)

If you use Liberating Step triggered by a fiend, your ally gains a +4 circumstance bonus to checks granted by your Liberating Step, and the ally can Step twice afterward.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Yl2wYv24v5kw95aS]{Point Blank Stance}

When using a ranged weapon that doesn't have the volley trait, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to damage rolls on attacks against targets within the weapon's first range increment.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.VSINzKESKAw2zA20]{Ceremony of Protection}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Mwangi Expanse

name: Effect: Come and Get Me (Circumstance Bonus)

description.value:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Z9gzWFk3qom2z904]{Come and Get Me}

Ephemeral effect. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to damage rolls.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.56HvICglqH7uR3AY]{Cantorian Rejuvenation}

You gain 10 temporary Hit Points. At 15th level, you instead gain 15 temporary HP.
You get a +4 circumstance bonus to AC and are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened}. The additional action can be used to Strike or Stride.

publication.title: Pathfinder #199: To Bloom Below the Web

description.value:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.NBvhmNqneeok7ZOr]{Overdrive Ally}

Until the end of their next turn, that ally's Strikes deal additional damage equal to half your Intelligence modifier, or your full Intelligence modifier if you were in critical overdrive.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.koER7gKf6CnW5O0s]{Raise Symbol}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saving throws until the start of your next turn. While it's raised, if you roll a success at a saving throw against a vitality or void effect, you get a critical success instead.

You gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.9qV49KjZujZnSp6w]{All-Around Vision} until the start of your next turn. This lets you see in all directions and prevents you from being flanked.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Mwangi Expanse

description.value:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.NZgjqVV2HYzLCvvA]{Aldori Parry}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BuVIM4cV7qhVZ2WF]{Raise Menhir}

Choose arcane, divine, or occult; all creatures within 15 feet of the monument gain a +2 status bonus to their saving throws against effects with that trait.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Perception.

Your overwatch field aura grants you increased perception and allows you to call out warnings to your allies within the aura to point out threats. This aura has the auditory and visual traits. You and allies within your overwatch field receive a +2 circumstance bonus when using Perception for Initiative checks.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.w5koctOVrEcpxTIq]{Bloodline: Demonic}

Either a target takes a -1 status penalty to AC for 1 round, or you gain a +2 status bonus to Intimidation checks.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xgvKXeTxns0gIdAn]{Smite}.

Designate one enemy you can see. Until the start of your next turn, your Strikes against that enemy gain a +3 status bonus to damage, increasing to +4 if you have master proficiency with the weapon or unarmed attack you're using for the Strike. If you're holy or unholy and the target has the opposite trait, the bonus is +4 (or +6 if you're a master).

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.GxkTe4VM7u26uZGI]{Pushing Wind}

You gain a +5-foot circumstance bonus to land Speed.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Tian Xia Character Guide

description.value:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.2yq3l8e2Vzz34yRV]{Monster Warden} if you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Veyt4x2Kb5YcPGTv]{Legendary Monster Hunter}.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll against that prey.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your next saving throw against that particular creature and to your AC against that creature's next attack against you.

rules.label: Target is the subject of Monster Hunter

name: Effect: Lost in the Crowd (10 Creatures)

description.value:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.d8RfatiK9UOQANLz]{Lost in the Crowd}

You've learned how to move as one with crowds and hide among them, vanishing into a busy street in the blink of an eye. You move at full Speed in crowds and can use cover from crowds to Hide and Sneak, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus on your Stealth checks when in a crowd of at least 10 creatures.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.AN9jY1JVcU20Qdw6]{Wolf Stance}

You enter the stance of a wolf, low to the ground with your hands held like fanged teeth. You can make wolf jaw unarmed attacks. These deal 1d8 piercing damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, backstabber, finesse, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

If you're flanking a target while in Wolf Stance, your wolf jaw unarmed attacks also gain the trip trait.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.jNzjecRGyyAqkkrm]{Deep Freeze}

On a Success, you take a -5-foot status penalty to your Speeds.

On a Failure, you take a -10-foot status penalty to your Speeds.

On a Critical Failure, you are slowed 1 and take a -15-foot status penalty to your Speeds.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ABXUfGoeBgCyFasg]{Great Tengu Form}

You also gain the benefits of 4th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Enlarge} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.A2JfEKe6BZcTG1S8]{Fly} spells.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.7FRYyKXDKjGoANYj]{Stumbling Stance}

You enter a seemingly unfocused stance that mimics the movements of the inebriated—bobbing, weaving, leaving false openings, and distracting your enemies from your true movements. While in this stance, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Deception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feint}.

The only Strikes you can make are stumbling swing unarmed attacks. These deal 1d8 bludgeoning damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, backstabber, finesse, nonlethal, and unarmed traits. If an enemy hits you with a melee Strike while in this stance, it becomes off-guard against the next stumbling swing Strike you make against it before the end of your next turn.
You gain temporary Hit Points equal to twice your level.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.uisI6b7Ua5zSHDwj]{Psi Strikes}

The attack deals an extra 1d6 force damage.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.QZb0Utg0WFPf2Qg0]{Goblin Song}

The creature takes a -1 status penalty to Perception checks and Will saves.
You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level, or equal to your level if the Strike was a critical hit. These temporary Hit Points last until the start of your next turn.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

Gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saves against disease and poison effects.
You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against fear.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.cBYTVYqw1EFVEuzs]{Bolera's Interrogation}

On a failure, the creature takes a -2 penalty to Deception checks. On a critical failure, the penalty to Deception checks is -4. This effect lasts for 10 minutes.

publication.title: Pathfinder #157: Devil at the Dreaming Palace

description.value:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.Z6E1O8X7CFcyczB1]{Blessed Swiftness}

You gain a +2 status bonus to all defenses against reactions triggered by your movement.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.tSmd0cxq9wokSCh4]{Castigating Weapon}

Your weapon or unarmed Strikes gain your holy or unholy trait and deal additional spirit damage.

Eerily beautiful elemental water beings race around you, eager to protect and heal you and your allies. Their forms vary and might include eels formed of undulating water or ice crystals whirling in the shape of a jellyfish. The guardians flow around combatants and don't occupy a space. They attempt to intercept all dangers, granting you and your allies within your kinetic aura a +1 status bonus to AC and saving throws.

If any creature affected is critically hit or critically fails at a saving throw against an attack, effect from an enemy, or hazard and remains above 0 HP, the guardians reach out to heal that creature. The creature regains 4d8+8 HP, and the impulse ends. If the creature is in water, the healing dice are d10s instead of d8s.

Level (+3) The healing increases by 1d8+4.

@Damage[((floor((max(12,@actor.level)-12)/3)+4)d8+(floor((max(12,@actor.level)-12)/3)*4+8))[healing]]{Leveled HP}

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.tMsAj0H0B9XZQjtH]{Accursed Clay Fist}

You take a -2 status penalty to saving throws against curse effects for 1 hour.
The creature gains a status bonus to Reflex saves and Acrobatics checks.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Ek1CoyGKxsozDsaD]{Guide the Timeline}

Choose an ally or a foe. If you choose an ally, the next time within the next round that ally makes an attack roll or skill check, they roll it twice and take the higher result. If you choose a foe, the next time within the next round that foe makes an attack roll or skill check, they must roll twice and take the lower result.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.pqVG9mRKcXg5Rsjc]{Thoughtform Summoning}

Whenever you summon a creature, you can choose to instead create a psychic construct of that creature. This grants it resistance to physical damage equal to half its level and weakness 5 to force and mental damage.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.oLE64eHT9sB82lTP]{Channeler's Stance}

Whenever you cast or Sustain an apparition spell or vessel spell that deals energy damage, you gain a status bonus to the spell's damage equal to the spell's rank.

Each time you Cast a Spell that has the vitality or void traits and that restores Hit Points while in this stance, the spells' targets gain a status bonus to the initial amount of healing received equal to the spell's rank. This bonus healing does not apply to healing over time effects (such as fast healing or regeneration).

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.yxqNBGvFkwi3pLVD]{Apparition's Enhancement}

One wielded weapon or unarmed attack you have deals an extra 1d6 spirit damage.
Applied when you apply a poison created with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.9Eufa07qvXG41QmG]{Improved Poison Weapon}.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.2qR4QAgJVArv63Z2]{Prayer-Touched Weapon}

The chosen weapon deals an extra 1d6 vitality damage.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

description.value:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.JJPoMcxUf3QoKA6h]{Combat Premonition}

Choose two allies. Those allies roll their initiative roll twice and take the better result; You roll your initiative roll twice and take the worse result.
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xSYkYRKlSyLzPrH1]{Undying Conviction}

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.AkV4Jyllo6nlK2Sl]{Cobra Stance}

You enter a tight stance, coiled up like a lashing cobra with your hands poised as venomous fangs. While in this stance, the only Strikes you can make are cobra fang unarmed attacks. These deal 1d4 piercing damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, deadly d10, finesse, unarmed, and venomous traits.

While in Cobra Stance, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves and your Fortitude DC, and you gain poison resistance equal to half your level.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.7PjBANpMMoBxTYq3]{Steam Knight}

You shape your kinetic aura into swirling armor of steam that scalds your enemies and propels you on super-heated jet streams. A creature can take damage from Steam Knight only once per round. Your steam armor has the following effects.

  • You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed.
  • When you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leap}, you can jump up to your Speed. You don't immediately fall at the end of a jump, provided you Leap again with your next action. If you Leap over a creature and come within 10 feet, that creature takes @Damage[(floor((@actor.level -6)/5)+2)d6[fire]] damage with a @Check[reflex|against:kineticist|basic] save against your class DC.
  • At the start of each of your turns, you can emit steam as a free action. It deals @Damage[(floor((@actor.level -6)/5)+2)d6[fire]] damage to each creature in your kinetic aura with a @Check[reflex|against:kineticist|basic] save against your class DC. A creature that fails is also pushed 5 feet.

Level (+5) The fire damage from a jump or blast of steam increases by 1d6.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.XdicxD5jMJ8JSVqk]{Siphon Torment}

The target gains temporary Hit Points equal to your level.

name: Effect: Lost in the Crowd (100 Creatures)

description.value:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.d8RfatiK9UOQANLz]{Lost in the Crowd}

You've learned how to move as one with crowds and hide among them, vanishing into a busy street in the blink of an eye. You move at full Speed in crowds and can use cover from crowds to Hide and Sneak, gaining a +4 circumstance bonus on your Stealth checks when in a crowd of at least 100 creatures.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Xw7qG0SHepXx24vl]{Prevailing Position}

You leave the stance you were in, gaining a +4 circumstance bonus to the triggering saving throw or to your AC against the triggering attack.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.UjEeHamC2C8JfgJz]{Sky and Heaven Stance}

Your jagged blows are like lightning. The only Strikes you can make are skyward slash unarmed attacks. These unarmed attacks deal 1d10 slashing damage; are in the brawling group; and have the nonlethal, unarmed, and versatile P traits. While in Sky and Heaven Stance, you gain resistance 2 to electricity and resistance 2 to sonic damage. These resistances increase to 5 at 12th level and to 8 at 18th level.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.6RAHnACKReBW68Sa]{Encroaching Presence}

Mild Backlash You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 3}.

Moderate Backlash All creatures become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} to you as they are covered in visual distortions only you can see.

Severe Backlash You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} until your next daily preparations.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.fzERYW7BJQoxlvoD]{Corpse-Killer's Defiance}

You gain a +1 status bonus to attack and damage rolls against undead.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Knights of Lastwall

description.value:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.KxpaxUSuBC7hr4F7]{Exemplary Finisher}

The foe takes a -2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls against you until the start of your next turn.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.dTO1ShJovbzrKUY4]{Resounding Bravery} if you critically succeed at a Will save against a foe's fear effect.

You gain a +2 status bonus to saves and a number of temporary Hit Points equal to your level for 1 minute.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ybrx1nsg5J0L8d3j]{Shared Clarity}

Allies within 15 feet of you who failed the same saving throw against the same mental effect can also spend their reactions to reroll the failed saving throw with a +2 circumstance bonus.

You sway in a loose stance that lets you sweep in wide arcs with the claws on your feet. The only Strikes you can make are spinning talon unarmed attacks. These deal 1d8 slashing damage, are in the brawling group, and have the finesse, sweep, and unarmed traits. You don't need a free hand to use spinning talon strikes.
You gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws for the remainder of the combat encounter as your morale soars or a +2 status bonus if the card you drew was from the suit of Books.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.7RFjTTzznsdPcaYB]{Emblazon Armament}

  • Shield The shield gains a +1 status bonus to its Hardness.
  • Weapon The wielder gains a +1 status bonus to damage rolls with the weapon.

You extend the claws in your hands and focus your attention to take down single targets. The only Strikes you can make are frenzied claw unarmed attacks. These deal 1d6 slashing damage, are in the brawling group, and have the agile, finesse, grapple, unarmed, and versatile piercing traits.

name: Effect: Come and Get Me (Temporary Hit Points)

description.value:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Z9gzWFk3qom2z904]{Come and Get Me}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your Constitution modifier, or double that on a critical hit. These temporary Hit Points last until the end of your rage.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.GU3EQVOMjD9S2YWj]{Hone Claws}

Your claws deal an additional 1d6 bleed damage.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.fjB514XFJG4V3wMy]{Unleash Yaoguai Might}

You gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Tian Xia Character Guide

description.value: You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level.
The ally gains resistance to all damage against the triggering damage equal to 2 + your level.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.9oKtrUzXixj58hOg]{Psychic Rapport}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Deception, Diplomacy, and Intimidation checks, and to Perception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1xRFPTFtWtGJ9ELw]{Sense Motive}
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ZGT7NLpcvREkJsMd]{Repair Module}.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.IBEbFlMmDbGsrN4G]{Raise the Walls}

You gain a +1 status bonus to AC, Reflex saves, and any save against force, spirit, vitality, or void effect.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.GNMy7NYfF3AQwHpN]{Divine Health}

You gain a +1 status bonus to saves against diseases and poisons.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.d8DI7wLxtUy99g9K]{Emotional Surge}

You gain a +2 status bonus to attack rolls and skill checks.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.13QpCrR8a8XULbJa]{Continuous Flair}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to further checks for actions that would grant you panache in combat.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.iWvpq3uDZcXvBJj8]{Known Weaknesses}.

Your ally gains a +1 circumstance bonus to their next attack roll against the subject of known weakness, as long as their attack is made before the beginning of your next turn.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Zl6vDXJEM7Lbp8JQ]{Rampaging Form}

You Change Shape into a form of living ice for 1 minute or until you shift back. Your battle form is Huge and has the following statistics:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 20 temporary Hit Points.
  • Low-light vision and imprecise scent 30 feet.
  • A Speed of 30, a Fly speed of 40, and you don't need to breathe
  • Melee a jaws, Damage 2d8 piercing + 1d4 fire damage.
  • Your unarmed attacks deal 1d4 additional fire damage, and your fire spells deal one additional die of fire damage (of the same damage die the spell uses).
  • You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.O9w7r4BKgPogYDDe]{Produce Flame} as an innate spell; the casting is reduced from 2 actions to 1.
  • Any creature that touches you or damages you with an unarmed attack or non-reach melee weapon takes @Damage[3d6[fire]] damage.
  • Athletics modifier of +20, unless your own modifier is higher.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.sFAqKrzqXQhtrfqN]{Sixth Pillar Mastery}

You have a -1 status penalty to saves against spells from the source, or you gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls with your unarmed Strikes.

publication.title: Pathfinder Fists of the Ruby Phoenix Hardcover Compilation

description.value:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.QN55ToyJIjxgPmhs]{Perfect Resistance}

After using a Student of Perfection ki spell, the resistance increases to be equal to your level for 1 round.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xSYkYRKlSyLzPrH1]{Undying Conviction}

Undead creatures gain a +2 status bonus to saving throws to resist vitality damage and to Will saving throws to resist effects that would make them controlled.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.E8SDesgMD6Zbye2j]{Geomancer Dedication}

Enemies take a -5-foot status penalty to their Speeds (-10-foot on a critical failure).

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.bi9w4Z9MQY8VWLZF]{Animate Net}

On a success, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} and takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds until it Escapes; on a critical success, it's also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} until it Escapes.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Grand Bazaar

description.value:
You gain tremorsense (imprecise) in your kinetic aura.

At 13th level this becomes precise tremorsense.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.wiV1CBh1OBhQCfbp]{Dissolution's Sight}

You gain greater darkvision.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Tian Xia Character Guide

description.value: You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC and to any defenses against being Shoved or Tripped
Applied when you apply a poison created with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.AYXherMu9gFTyXjp]{Deadly Poison Weapon}.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Y8LHfkzGyOhPlUou]{Twin Parry} if either weapon has the parry trait.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.SkarN4VlNxSJSJNw]{Wild Winds Stance}

You take on the stance of the flowing winds, sending out waves of energy at a distance.

You can make wind crash unarmed Strikes as ranged Strikes against targets within 30 feet. These deal 1d6 bludgeoning damage, use the brawling group, and have the agile, nonlethal, propulsive, and unarmed traits. Wind crash Strikes ignore concealment and all cover.

While in wild winds stance, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against ranged attacks.

rules.text: Wind crash strikes ignore concealment and all cover
rules.title: Wild Wind Stance

description.value:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.JcXzKwrdMkNszrJQ]{Divine Infusion}

The target deals additional damage with its melee weapons and unarmed attacks until the end of its next turn. The damage type is void if you cast harm and vitality if you cast heal.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.U0XX0Mm2MbZcuNK2]{Shared Overdrive}

The first time you use Overdrive Ally during a given Overdrive, the effect lasts for the remainder of the duration of your Overdrive, instead of just until the end of the target's next turn.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.8YIA0jh64Ecz0TG6]{Desecration}

Each enemy in your champion's aura takes a –1 status penalty to attack rolls against you.
You focus on your connection to the earth and call upon the mountain to block attacks against you. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the beginning of your next turn.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.83zzG4XBiL5I3NZv]{Revitalizing Finisher}

You and all allies within 30 feet gain temporary Hit Points equal to half your level.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.DmpJgLsHfv1kMcJc]{Legendary Monster}.

Your yaoguai form has reached its pinnacle, allowing you to assume (or perhaps, return to) the form of a monster of legend. You can Unleash Yaoguai Might any number of times per day. Once per day when you Unleash Yaoguai Might, you can gain one of the following additional benefits, which persists for 1 minute or until you Change Shape again.

  • Your body grows to impossible heights. Your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Enlarge} effect is heightened to 4th rank.
  • Your spiritual power erupts to punish your enemies. You deal an additional 1d4 spirit damage with all Strikes and attack spells, and your Strikes and attack spells gain the spirit trait.
  • You can leap off the air itself. You gain the effects of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.A2JfEKe6BZcTG1S8]{Fly} spell.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Tian Xia Character Guide

description.value: The target is unable to flank or provide flanking.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.9Jbl71C5C6MnOqxV]{Consume Energy}

Strikes with the chosen weapon or unarmed attack deal an additional 1d6 damage of a type matching the energy you consumed.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.5Cm2TYHzoO2DbQNM]{Reanimator Dedication}

The undead you animate gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, AC, saving throws, and skill checks for the duration of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9WGeBwIIbbUuWKq0]{Summon Undead}.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.bvOsJNeI0ewvQsFa]{Inspiring Marshal Stance}.

Your marshal's aura grants you and allies a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and saves against mental effects.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.JS24EjgLYcHB9E3T]{Nanite Surge}.

Your circuitry glows, lighting a @Template[emanation|distance:10] with dim light for 1 round.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.eNZnx4LISDNftbx2]{Chirurgeon}

The creature gains a number of temporary Hit Points equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.s2GbcUIXG1ZBurSd]{Hamstringing Strike}

If you hit your prey, the creature takes a -5-foot status penalty to Speed. If you critically hit your prey, the creature takes a -10-foot status penalty to Speed.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.o1gGG36wpn9mxeop]{Life}

Curse of Outpouring Life

Life energy flows outward from you and connects you to all living things, but you expend your vital essence to do so. Your presence comforts the ill and injured, causes scars to fade slightly, spurs new growth in plants, and otherwise infuses your surroundings with vitality.

Minor Curse

As your life force seeps outward, it becomes more difficult to keep your body functioning. Effects that restore Hit Points to you take a status penalty equal to half your level (minimum 1) to the number of HP you recover.

Moderate Curse

The flow of life energy away from you can't be reversed.

In addition to the effects of your minor curse, you can't be healed by magical effects originating from other creatures. However, if you are unconscious, magical effects can restore you to 1 HP (but no higher). You are affected normally by healing elixirs, potions, and other items.

When you cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} and all your targets are living creatures, you roll d12s instead of d8s for the amount of healing.

Whenever you finish casting a non-cantrip spell, you restore Hit Points equal to the spell rank to your choice of either one target of the spell or the creature nearest to you. You can't heal yourself in this way. This healing has the healing, necromancy, and vitality traits, as well as the tradition trait of the spell.

Major Curse (11th)

Life energy tears through you to empower your magic. Some of your spells carry vitality energy with them.

Each time you use a spell slot to cast a 5th-rank or higher spell that takes 2 or more actions to cast, you disperse vitality energy in a @Template[burst|distance:30] with the effects of a 3-action @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} spell with a level 4 lower than that of the spell you cast. This healing occurs immediately after you finish Casting the Spell. You don't benefit from this healing. Instead, you lose double the number of Hit Points rolled for the heal spell.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.CowQy8gXP9POjuxq]{Game Hunter Dedication}

Your Speeds are each reduced by 10 feet.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Gcliatty0MGYbTVV]{Oracular Warning}

Each ally gains a +2 status bonus to their initiative roll. If you are cursebound 2 when you use Oracular Warning, the bonus increases to +3, and if you are cursebound 3, the bonus increases to +4.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Y8LHfkzGyOhPlUou]{Twin Parry} if neither weapon has the parry trait.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.YgytD4HGjWNFwiev]{Arcane Propulsion}

You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Nm8n3urzpDqXni1i]{Disrupting Strikes}

Your weapon and unarmed Strikes gain the effects of a disrupting property rune until the start of your next turn.

If you're 14th level or higher, your Strikes instead gain the effects of a greater disrupting property rune.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.qOGD3K8VlQAAjsWy]{Intensified Element Stance}

Your Strikes and damaging spells deal an additional 1d6 damage against certain creatures, depending on the type of elemental medicine expended. If the person who crafted the elemental medicine expended was legendary in the skill they used, increased this damage to 2d6.

  • Earth acid damage against water creatures

  • Fire fire damage against metal creatures and constructs that are primarily metallic

  • Metal electricity damage against wood or plant creatures and constructs primarily made of wood or plant matter

  • Water sonic damage against fire creatures

  • Wood cold damage against earth creatures and constructs that are primarily made of rock or earth
